headline: Why CareTrust, Genuine Parts, And Hess Midstream Are Winners For Passive Income
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. CareTrust, Genuine Parts, and Hess Midstream have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of up to 6%. CareTrust REIT CareTrust REIT (NYSE:CTRE) primary business consists of acquiring, financing, developing and owning real property to be leased to third-party tenants in the healthcare sector
